phrs.translation: 净光合作用；净光能合成

sentences.sentence: By far the most ambitious project on CGIAR's list, though, involves transforming the way in which rice photosynthesises. That will require some serious genetic restructuring.
sentences.translation: 不过就目前而言，CGIAR开展的研究项目中最具有挑战性的还是改变水稻光合作用的途径，这就必须进行一丝不苟的基因重组。
